abstract.p: The Churn column on litigation related to recent corporate mergers and company appointments (M)

block.p: Michele Hirshman, first deputy attorney general of New York under Eliot Spitzer, is joining Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison as a partner. She will focus on internal investigations and white-collar defense.
Ptarmigan Capital, an asset management firm specializing in real estate-related investments, has named Arvind K. Bajaj, formerly of Credit Suisse, as a principal of the firm.

Michele Hirshman, first deputy attorney general of New York under Eliot Spitzer, is joining Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison as a partner. She will focus on internal investigations and white-collar defense.
Ptarmigan Capital, an asset management firm specializing in real estate-related investments, has named Arvind K. Bajaj, formerly of Credit Suisse, as a principal of the firm.

Richard Pustorino has joined Credit Suisse as a director and senior United States consultant relationship manager in asset management. He was previously with DuPont Capital Management. John Ricketts, formerly of CDR Financial Products, has also joined as a director in asset management, and Rinku Gyani, formerly of Lazard Asset Management, has joined as a vice president.

Kim Waldman has joined BNP Paribas Securities in New York as a director in alternative investments fund services sales. Fabian Banchiero has joined as a vice president in sales and relationship management for global fund services.
Mark J. Botti, a former senior official in the antitrust division of the Justice Department, is joining Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld as a partner.

BMO Capital Markets has hired Scott R. Singer as a managing director in its media, communications and technology group. Mr. Singer was previously a partner at Deloitte Touche and head of its United States media and entertainment practice.

Adam Frieman, until recently the deputy head of United States equity capital markets at UBS, has joined Probitas Partners as a principal in its New York office. Based in San Francisco, Probitas provides services including placement of private equity funds.
Michael A. Battle, former director of the executive office for United States attorneys at the Justice Department, has joined Fulbright & Jaworski's Washington office as a partner.
Edward J. Johnsen, a law partner Winston & Strawn, has been elected chairman of the market operations review committee of the Nasdaq Stock Market.
